bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of a communicable disease acquired by males through sexual intercourse with a female who had just been cured of harm caused by cold. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 8: 婦人得 病新瘥未平復，而男子與之交接得病者，名陰易 , “The disease acquired by a male who had intercourse with a female who had just been cured of the disease without having fully recovered yet is called ‘ yin exchange ’”.
